docs.snippet: The price of oil rose as the Russian government continued talks with Saudi Arabia and the OPEC oil cartel about cutting production.

headline.print_headline: Oil Prices and Facebook Move Market Up
headline.main: Modest Advance for the Market, Lifted by a Rise in Oil

docs.abstract: Stocks climb as oil prices rise for third day in row.

docs.snippet: On Saturday, Ted Cruz matched Donald Trump’s stride. Oh goody.
The West has not capitulated by hiding the Capitoline nudes. But Italy has again failed the test of seriousness.
Ms. Reynolds has emerged as an influential witness in the latest shooting of an African-American at the hands of a police officer.

headline.print_headline: The Poise of a Witness Gives Way  to Raw Pain
headline.main: After Poised Live-Streaming, Tears and Fury Find Diamond Reynolds

docs.abstract: Cool poise exhibited by Diamond Reynolds, girlfriend of slain black man Philando Castile, while live streaming his fatal shooting by police officer on Facebook gives way to raw grief in aftermath of tragedy; Reynold's presence of mind during violence allowed her to provide real time document of incident.

docs.snippet: How parents fight back against their kids’ obsession with smartphones and social media.

headline.print_headline: When Tech Is a Problem Child
headline.main: When Tech Is a Problem Child

docs.snippet: Korryn Gaines of Randallstown, Md., was killed after pointing a shotgun at the police, who say she may have been encouraged by online followers to defy their orders.

headline.print_headline: Instagram Posts May Have Escalated Fatal Standoff in Maryland, Police Say
headline.main: Instagram Posts May Have Escalated Fatal Standoff, Police Say

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump’s descriptions of sexual assault — and new allegations against him — have inspired inventive social-media responses.
docs.abstract: Mr. Trump’s descriptions of sexual assault — and new allegations against him — have inspired inventive social-media responses.

docs.snippet: Ahmad Majid is one of millions of people swept up in a global refugee crisis; his resettlement in Sweden ended when his young nephew died this week.

headline.print_headline: As Refugee Family Resettles in Sweden, 9-Year-Old Nephew Dies
headline.main: As Refugee Family Resettles in Sweden, 9-Year-Old Nephew Dies

docs.snippet: The president delivered a call for racial justice after two black men were killed by the police, only to face the cameras hours later to denounce the killings of five officers.

headline.print_headline: Obama Grapples for Balance After Word of Dallas Killings
headline.main: Obama’s Delicate Balance on Issue of Race and Policing

docs.abstract: Pres Obama grapples for balance on issue of race and policing following deadly shooting of police officers at Dallas protest; some police advocates blame Obama for what they say contributes to environment that encourages attacks on police, while grieving families demand justice for those who have died at hands of police.

docs.snippet: The college said it was still “carefully considering” the case after Prof. Joy Karega’s posts blamed the United States and Israel in terror attacks.
